column1: 03/18/2013,Taking too much contraceptives may harm your health. It may cause abdominal and chest pain nausea weight gain headache etc.
03/19/2013,If someone infected with HIV does not take proper treatment then it usually takes around ten years for AIDS to develop.
03/20/2013,Dark chocolates contain anti-oxidants and phenylethylamine which evoke feeling of being in love. They also prevent against infections.
03/21/2013,The missionary position is the best one for conception. This position enables the sperm to reach the closest to the vagina.
03/22/2013,Unsafe oral sex is as risky as intercourse. Forced oral sex can lead to injuries both in the mouth and genitals and pain during urination.
03/23/2013,If a pregnant woman is infected with HIV she can transmit the virus to her baby during pregnancy labour and delivery or breastfeeding.
03/24/2013,An HIV positive woman and an HIV negative man can conceive without HIV transmission occurring by using artificial insemination.
03/25/2013,It is widely prevalent fact that sex leads to an increase in the energy levels. It reduces stress and results in weight loss.
03/26/2013,Oral sex does not carry the threat of unwanted pregnancy as the semen is ejected in the mouth or on the body. You can't conceive through it.
03/27/2013,Condoms are the most effective contraceptive methods to prevent contracting HIV-infection. They are better than birth control pills.
03/28/2013,Taking Vitamin B-Complex i.e Vitamin B1 to B5 and B-12 help to raise your sexual desire. They improve the blood circulation as well.
03/29/2013,Practicing oral sex with more than one partner might lead to the transmission of STDs i.e Sexually Transmitted Diseases.
03/30/2013,Lying side by side during the penetration would put lesser strain on both the partners. It is helpful for women who are overweight.
03/31/2013,Just closing your eyes and kissing your partner is stimulus enough to get a desired response of being up intimate and one.
04/1/2013,According to sex therapists women who have had amazing sex are the ones who feel good about their body. So love yourself first.
